page.title: 02Food - Diet in Handsacre
page.content: {School lunches} July '85 {Monday} {Tuesday} {Wednesday} Chicken Pie Fish Beefburgers Potatoes Chips Roast potatoes Cabbage Peas Baked beans Dutch apple Jam sponge Ginger sponge Rice pudding Custard Lemon sauce {Thursday} {Friday} Cheese+egg Mince Crisps Chips Salad Mixed vegetables Tart Cornflake crunch ring People preferred:ITEM MEALS From survey at Hayes Meadow C.P Buns Lunch Pop Snack Chocolate Snack Meat Dinner Biscuits Snack Cornflakes Breakfast IN our local shop potatoes+Beef sell most.
